column3: 지구라는 별에서 온 little brother는 좋은 존재입니까?

column4: Will Little Brothers have a job?

column4: Does Utopia deserve to control each racial rule?

문화 예술 - 예산을 어디에 투자합니까? 

YES : 종족교류  (전체주의)
/ NO : 종족자치 (자유주의)

column4: Invest in Science & Technology is decided. Select details. (Y)Aerospace (N)Food resource
